titles: A Godlie treatisse declaryng the benefites, fruites, and great commodities of prayer and also the true vse therof. Written in Latin, fourtie yeres past, by an Englyshe man, of great vertue [and] learnyng. And lately translated into Englyshe. 1560.
author: Fisher, John, Saint, 1469-1535.
Montagu, Anthony Browne, Viscount, ca. 1528-1592.
publisher: In Powles Churchyarde by Iohn Cawood, one of the printers to the Queenes Maiestie,
notes: Imprint from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
